review: I'm enjoying it immensely.  There was a problem, however, setting it up.  I went through setup twice and it froze before loading the channels.  I then reset the streaming stick to factory condition and after that nothing worked.  Solution that worked for me: There is a tiny purple button in the battery compartment.  I pushed and held the purple button until the Roko logo showed up on my TV screen, then I replaced the battery cover and went through setup again and this time everything proceeded and worked flawlessly.  I suspect this solution might work for remotes that quit working about which some posters have commented.
